project.name: verify
project.description: Runs junit, pmd, checkstyle, findbugs, and javadoc, failing the build if problems found. Invocation: ant -f verify.build.xml
project.echo:
Hackystat SensorBase Verification Task
This task fails the build unless all of the following are true: * System compiles without warnings or errors. * JavaDocs can be built without warnings or errors. * JUnit test cases all pass. * Checkstyle of source code generates no warnings. * PMD generates no warnings. * FindBugs generates no warnings.
It also runs the Emma code coverage tool and prints a summary report.

target.name: verify
target.depends: clean, compile, javadoc, junit.tool, checkstyle.tool, findbugs.tool, emma.tool, pmd.tool, emma.echo
target.description: Invoke analyzers, fail if any errors found.
